name: La vie c'est de la merde tunic T-shirt
description:
La vie c'est de la merde (Life is shit) on a lovely supersoft bright white Tunic T-shirt.

100% organic and fairly traded cotton T-shirt screenprinted with waterbased black ink.

Design: Pini Piru

For strong independent woman who love to wear their boyfriends pants ;-)

Sizes available:

Small
Medium
Large

Size shown in the picture is Small.

name: You like my Shirt?
description:
A very special collaboration with the Hoorn based artist Robert Schutte and Pini Piru.

The design Robert made is screenprinted with black waterbased ink on a supersoft 100% organic and fairly traded cotton heather grey V-neck T-shirt for Gents!

Sizes available:

Small
Medium
Large

He is also the model in this photoshoot :-)

Every T-shirt comes with a unique 10x15 cm customized artwork by Robert Schutte!
Screenprint and ink, signed and numbered.

name: Tom T-shirt for guys
description:
For the love of Magnum P.I. 
Thomas Magnum in his tiny shorts, his smile, his voice and his moustache.. we needed him on a T-shirt!

Screenprinted with black waterbased ink on super soft heather blue 100% organic and fairly traded cotton T-shirts for Gents.

If you are a girl that wants Tom on a T-shirt, just let us know and we print one for you!

Size available:

Small
Medium
Large

Design: Pini Piru

name: Dandelion sweatshirt
description:
Supersoft navy blue very warm tight fit sweater made of 20% recycled polyester and 80%organic cotton.
The sleeves and bottom hem have a distressed look!

Printed in a limited edition! 

Screenprinted with white waterbased ink for a vintage look.

They are a very tight fit!

name: Chick in Boots kids T-shirt
description:
Chick in Boots screenprinted on a heather green supersoft 100% organic and fairly traded cotton kids T-shirt.

Screenprinted by hand with waterbased non-toxic black ink

sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years

Design: Chick in Boots by Wendie Duin for Pini Piru

name: Black Birds slouchy pullover
description:
Supersoft, lightweight slouchy pullover in light grey made of recycled polyester, organic cotton & rayon.

Screenprinted with our Black Birds design in black waterbased non-toxic ink.

Available in Small, Medium and Large. 
(Model shows a Large)

name: The Rise of the Rabbits
description:
The Rise of the Rabbits screenprinted with white waterbased ink on a 100% organic cotton supersoft guys T-shirt.

Screenprinted in a limited edition combination on a small batch of grey T-shirts with a destroyed vintage look and feel.

Size available:

Medium
Large

Design: Pini Piru

If you want this design printed on another colour T-shirt, don't hesitate to ask!
We can print you one :-)

name: Mister Kat cushion
description:
One of a kind cushion combinations.

Mister Kat screenprinted with black waterbased ink on vintage Hungarian cotton.

For the back we used lovely bright coloured batik from Mozambique. 

The cushion is filled with recycled polyester. 
Hand wash with mild detergent and air dry.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Design: by Wendie Duin for Pini Piru

name: Snow White artwork
description:
Pini Piru's own version of the very famous Brothers Grimm tale Snow White:)

Handpulled screenprint in a limited edition run of 50.

Screenprinted on acid free off-white paper size: 30x30 cm
With waterbased black & red ink.

All prints are signed and numbered.

name: The Birds II Cushion
description:
A one of a kind cushion!

The Birds II in black waterbased ink screenprinted by hand on organic unbleeched cotton. 
For the back we used sarong fabric from Lombok, Indonesia. 

For the zigzag stitching we used neon thread.

The cushion is filled with recycled polyester. 
Hand wash with mild detergent and air dry.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Design: Pini Piru

name: Monster ABC poster
description:
Pini Piru's very own monster ABC! 
For kids and grown-ups ;-)

A nice & different way to learn the ABC's
Kids love it:-)

To see them coming to life: http://youtu.be/t2GQA9Cce1E

It's an off-set poster size: 30x40 cm
Prints will be send in a small cardboard tube:)

name: Chick in Boots Cushion
description:
Chick in Boots screenprinted with black waterbased ink on vintage Hungarian cotton.

For the back we used great handprinted fabric from Samoa.
One of the great islands in the Pacific!

We only made one cushion in this combination, so it is a unique one

The cushion is filled with recycled polyester. 
Hand wash with mild detergent and air dry.

Size: 45x45 cm 
Design: by Wendie Duin for Pini Piru

name: The Feeder cushion
description:
The Feeder on a supersoft one of a kind cushion.

For the front we used unbleeched cotton screenprinted by hand with waterbased non-toxic black ink.

For the back we used batik sarong fabric from Java Indonesia.

The stitching on one side is done with gold thread.

The filling is supersoft eco friendly kapok. 
kapok can't be washed, so it's spot cleaned only!

Size: 45x45 cm
Design: Pini Piru

name: F*ck it cushion
description:
A one of a kind cushion with a handpulled screenprint with black waterbased ink.

Screenprinted on vintage Hungarian cotton and on the other side a lovely handprinted fabric from Samoa!

We only made one cushion in this combination, so it is a unique one

The cushion is filled with recycled polyester.
Hand wash with mild detergent and air dry.

Size: 45x45 cm
Design: Pini Piru

name: Jingle Deer T-shirt
description:
Jingle Deer the Queen of the forrest screenprinted with two shades of raspberry waterbased non-toxic ink.

On a supersoft T-shirt that is made of 70% bamboo & 30% organic cotton. Fairly traded!

This fabric is cooling in summer, warm in winter, and environmentally friendly. 
Combined with 30% ORGANIC cotton, the BAMBOO fabric becomes softer than ever and has beautiful drape. 

If you like a tight fit, choose one size smaller then usual:)

See sizing chart for a good fit!

name: Mister Kat kids T-shirt
description:
Mr. Kat screenprinted on a heather grey supersoft 100% organic and fairly traded cotton kids T-shirt.
Also available for boys!

Screenprinted by hand with waterbased non-toxic black ink

sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years
9-11 years
12-14 years

Design: Mr. Kat by Wendie Duin for Pini Piru

name: Chick in Boots artwork
description:
A chick with boots in black waterbased ink on heavy weight handmade acid free paper from France.

Handpulled screenprint which makes every print unique.
Screenprinted in a run of 50

Design: Wendie Duin for Pini Piru
Size: big 28x38 cm

Comes without passepartout and frame.
Frame in photo is 30x40 which is a standard size.

name: Octogirl kids T-shirt
description:
Octogirl on a heather red 100% organic and fairly traded cotton T-shirt for kids.

Screenprinted with waterbased black & white ink.

Supersoft and perfect fit:-)

Design: Pini Piru

Sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years
9-11 years
12-14 years

name: The Bone Collector
description:
They always go for the bone..
Something sweet to brighten up your wall!

Screenprinted with black waterbased ink on 300 g/m matt Hahnemuhle acid free watercolour paper.

The red is painted in by hand

Screenprinted in a run of 40.
All prints are signed and numbered

Size: 25,4x25,4 cm
Design: Pini Piru

name: The Grin Kids T-shirt
description:
A cat with a huge grin screenprinted on a heather grey supersoft 100% organic and fairly traded cotton kids T-shirt.

Screenprint by hand with waterbased non-toxic dark raspberry coloured ink
And a dash of gold on the ribbon of his tail.. 

sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years
9-11 years
12-14 years

Design: By Pini Piru

name: Hunting Rabbits cushion
description:
There are only two of these made in this combination!

The Hunting Rabbits in black waterbased ink screenprinted by hand on organic cotton.
For the back sides of our cushions we use all sorts of left over fabric.
For these two it's this lovely flower cotton.

The cushion is filled with recycled polyester. 
Hand wash with mild detergent and air dry.

Size: 45x45 cm
Design: Pini Piru

name: Mixtape artwork
description:
A mixtape screenprinted in black waterbased ink on heavy weight handmade acid free paper from France.

Handpulled screenprint which makes every print unique. 
Screenprinted in a run of 50

Design: Pini Piru 
Size: big 28x38 cm

Comes without passepartout and frame. 
Frame in photo is 30x40 which is a standard size.

name: Penny kids T-shirt
description:
Penny with her bunny on a bright white 100% organic and fairly traded cotton T-shirt for kids.

Screenprinted with waterbased non-toxic black ink.

Supersoft and perfect fit:-)

Design: Pini Piru

Sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years

name: Jingle Deer kids T-shirt
description:
Limited Edition screenprint! 

Jingle Deer by Wendie Duin for Pini Piru.

Screenprinted with waterbased Pink ink on bright white 100% organic cotton & fairly traded cotton T-shirts!

Supersoft and perfect fit:-)

Sizes available:

3-4 years
5-6 years
7-8 years
9-11 years
12-14 years

Only 4 of each size is available!

name: Ice Surprise screenprint
description:
First only on a T-shirt, but now also in a limited edition run of 25 on high quality paper:-)

Handpulled screenprint with waterbased fluor/neon orange and black ink on Hahnemuhle 350 gsm acid free Artist paper. 

All prints are signed and numbered.

The size of the artwork (paper) is big A3.

name: Max & Penny notebooks
description:
The famous moleskine with our Max and Penny on the cover!  
Moleskine size: 9x14 cm with blanco pages. 
And a Pini Piru stamp on the back.

A great size for your bag or backpocket!
For all your secrets, things you don't want to forget and all your great ideas and drawings:-)

In a set of two!

Handpulled screenprint with black waterbased ink.

Design: Pini Piru

name: Say it with style Gocco card
description:
This sweet little man with a blanco text balloon for you to fill with some great text!

Printed on the great vintage Japanese Gocco printer on cards made from recycled paper and left-over confetti.

Size cards: 10x15 cm

They come with an envelope made from topographic paper that is saved from the paper bin!
Lovely envelopes that have text and maps on the inside and are white on the outside.
No envelope is the same.

name: Killing me softly notebook and card
description:
Mr. Mouse on his own this time. 
You might recognize him from 'Curiosity Killed the Cat'..;-)

A card and a moleskine notebook with blanco pages with a stone grey cover.

Size moleskine: 7x14 cm

Size card: 12x12 cm
Paper: acid free 350 gsm artist paper

They come with an envelope made from topographic paper that is saved from the paper bin!
Lovely envelopes that have text and maps on the inside and are white on the outside.
No envelope is the same.

Screenprinted by hand with black waterbased non-toxic ink.

Price is for one card with envelope and one moleskine notebook.

name: Succubus notebook
description:
The famous moleskine with our Succubus on the cover! 

Succubus:

In folklore traced back to medieval legend succubus is a female demon who takes the form of a human woman in order to seduce men in their dreams, usually through sexual intercourse.

In modern times, a succubus may or may not appear in dreams and is often depicted as a highly attractive seductress or enchantress, while in the past succubi were generally depicted as frightening and demonic....

Moleskine size: 13x21 cm with blanco pages. 

And a Pini Piru stamped on the back

A great size for your bag or backpocket! 
For all your secrets, things you don't want to forget and all your great ideas/drawings:-)

Handpulled screenprint with white waterbased ink.

name: The Kings Crown screenprint
description:
First only on a T-shirt, but now also in a limited edition run of 25 on high quality paper:-)

Handpulled screenprint with waterbased yellow and very dark grey ink on Hahnemuhle 300 gsm acid free Artist paper. 

All prints are signed and numbered.

The size of the artwork (paper) is big A4.

name: Money Monkey's artwork
description:
Limited edition screenprints of Two Monkey's in a suit! 

Screenprinted in a run of 35 with black waterbased ink on handmade French paper.

Paper size: 32,5x50 cm

All prints are signed and numbered.

Will be send in a cardboard tube

name: Music Moves Me Poster
description:
The movie quote: Music moves me, but it moves me ugly ;-)
William H. Macy is the one who says that hilarious line!

From the film Wild Hogs!

Director: Walt Becker 
Writer: Brad Copeland

Printed in a run of 35 on high quality acid free raged paper size: 50x70

We have 15 posters in Neon Pink & 20 posters in bright red!

All prints are signed and numbered and will be send in a cardboard tube:)

-------------------------------------------

Een quote uit de film Wild Hogs!

Director: Walt Becker 
Writer: Brad Copeland

Music Moves Me But Moves Me Ugly

William H. Macy zegt deze lollige zin ;-)

Geprint in een gelimiteerde oplage van 35 op mooie kwaliteit zuurvrij papier formaat: 50x70 cm
Gesigneerd & genummerd.
Zeefdruk met inkt op waterbasis

15 stuks in Neon Pink & 20 stuks in sprankelend rood!

We verzenden de poster opgerold in een kartonnen koker!

name: Party Boy Artwork
description:
Limited edition screenprint with waterbased ink & ecoline on Velin Rives Blanc handmade paper from France.

Papersize is 35x50 cm

Done in a printrun of 35 and all prints are signed and numbered.

Will be send in a cardboard tube:)
